## Problem 2

```{r}
dental <- read.table("./HW6-dental.txt", header = TRUE) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    gender = as.factor(gender)
  )
```

### Part A: Make a spaghetti plot to infer how distance is affected by age and gender.

```{r}
ggplot(dental, 
       aes(age, distance, group = child, col = gender)) +
  geom_line()
```
